artist: Andy Baird; Mark Bueide; James DeWitt; Frank Gaard; Joe McDonnell; Bill McKearn; Ed Rath; Keith A. Smith; Bernie van Marm; Fritz Wolfmeyer; Chris Woodward; Published by Artpolice
description: 16 pages, stapled upper-left center, three color printed front cover; black and white publication with a few touches of red in cap and pants and of gold in baseball bat; man with bat also carrying a gun in PR hand; art police headquarters on banner behind the man; above banner, 3 windows with action in each window; left side (or back) of cover windows with people and animals in various stages of escape out the windows
marks:
Inscription

b.) on inside bottom right page han
title: Artpolice Newsletter, Vol. 2, No.1
